snippet.title: War Tortoise 2 - Action/Exploration/Idle Game
snippet.description:
**AVAILABLE NOW IN THE APP STORE AND GOOGLE PLAY STORE**

Take control of the mighty War Tortoise, a heavy tank armed to the teeth with powerful weapons and turrets! Explore a huge world, conquer new lands, recruit units, build defenses, collect resources, and ultimately destroy the enemy. Combining idle game and shooter elements, War Tortoise is a unique mix of gaming unlike anything before! 

FEATURES
⦁ Unique mix of shooter and idle game play
⦁ Console quality 3D graphics - watch as a huge war unfolds before your eyes
⦁ Tons of units, upgrades, and defenses to discover
⦁ Explore a huge map, conquering unique locations and biomes
⦁ Capture locations, build structures, and expand your dominion
⦁ Customize your Tortoise with weapons and heavy armor
⦁ Upgrade your army with powerful mutations and evolutions
⦁ Dozens of unique enemy types to battle against
⦁ Auto-Play mode, complete with a variety of camera modes to watch the battles unfold
